mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS_WISHLIST (BBS_SEQ, USER_EMAIL, REG_DATE) VALUES ( #{bbsSeq}, #{userEmail}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.BBS_SEQ BBS_SEQ, NVL(B.USER_EMAIL, '') USER_EMAIL, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') USER_NAME, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), '') REG_DATE, NVL(D.BBS_IMG_NAME, '') BBS_IMG_NAME, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') BBS_TITLE FROM BBS A, TBL_USER B, BBS_WISHLIST C, BBS_IMG D WHERE A.BBS_SEQ = C.BBS_SEQ AND B.USER_EMAIL = C.USER_EMAIL AND A.BBS_SEQ = D.BBS_SEQ AND A.BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID = 'CMSY' AND B.USER_EMAIL = #{value}

SELECT COUNT(A.BBS_TITLE) AS CNT FROM BBS A, TBL_USER B, BBS_WISHLIST C, BBS_IMG D WHERE A.BBS_SEQ = C.BBS_SEQ AND B.USER_EMAIL = C.USER_EMAIL AND A.BBS_SEQ = D.BBS_SEQ AND A.BBS_SUB_CATE_COMBINED_ID = 'CMSY' AND B.USER_EMAIL = #{value}
